channel.title: Comments on: Author Interview: Jeri Baird (“Tokens and Omens”)
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Jody
item.dc:creator: Jody
item.description: Great interview, Kaleigh! Surprised to learn we're both in the Houston area. Would love to grab coffee sometime. Houston writers for Luna unite! :-)
